data.text:
Size guide

MEN'S AND WOMEN'S CLOTHING SIZES IN VARIOUS COUNTRIES

While buying shoes, clothes or underwear in online stores, many people can get confused with the sizes. It seems to be very simple - there is a size conversion chart for men's, women's and children's clothes and shoes. However, sizes can vary greatly between different stores.

To make the process of shopping convenient and efficient, we give you detailed information on how to determine your size. Using the information below, you can easily find the right clothes that will fit your figure perfectly.

As a rule, each manufacturer has his own size chart, and in order not to choose clothes of the wrong size you should know your main measurements. To find your correct size you will need to use a tape measure.

It's better to take measurements wearing underwear for the measuring tape to fit closer to your body. If you want to buy clothes that should be loose, add 2 cm to the results.

Shopping at online stores is always a risk to get clothes of the wrong size. Therefore it's very important to know your right measurements, the Russian clothing size and understand the size charts given blow.
